commit message: Added test project and first simple test.
adt libraries and dependencies automatically changed.
Removed strange line that caused error.
Screen orientation can be one of all 4 cases.
Modified automatically when upgraded to Android bundle (Juno)
Raising target API to 19
Added FIXME comment to use setExact.
Refactoring
Updating Alarm Service when alarm fires, to set next alarm.
Preferences test suite.
Using AlarmManager.setExact if available.
Added tolerance and changed toast for next alarm.
Added default-fallback alarm from freesounds.org 26331.
Changed default preferences.
Button displays correct title of fallback sound.
In preferences, setting the time for a point moves all others.
Refactoring sound preview in preferences to solve crash issues.
Set stream type after reset.
Commenting slider behavior.
Honoring Activity life cycle.
Added intent type to prepare for active/inactive dawn signals.
Added timeout on Dawn inactivity.
Dawn signals sound service of activity/inactivity
MediaPlayer prepare synchronous because it's always a local file.
Configure DawnSound from Start Intent.
Rename into m_volumeUpdateTimer.
Small Timer refactoring.
inactiveTimer from Timer to Handler.
volume update as Handler instead of Timer
Placeholder to use hasVibrator
update brightness with Handler instead of Timer. Minor changes.
Resize slider Timer into Handler.
From MediaPlayer PlaybackCompleted state we can call start()
Embarassingly wrong code corrected for scheduling sound start.
Full brightness for Dawn Activity, and disabling lock.
Replaced deprecated flags for wake lock acquiring.
Added task comments.
Organize imports.
Added CREATOR field on BaseSavedState of custom view.
Ordered Parcel write/read, should help for BadParcelableException.
Sound URI management refactoring and fixing in Preferences.
Fixing fallback method and using it also for DawnSound.
Using default alarm as fallback.
Refactoring
Added plural to toast message.
Starting to add week day.
Moving weekday skipping functionality to Alarm.
Removing fallback sound, since we fall back to default anyway.
Added 'ext' directory for resources external to the apk.
Moved files from assets to ext dir.
Added feature image.
Bumping version number.
Added explicit support for tablets.
